title: What should i do to prep myself for cse aiml during the break?
content: Wanna know what i should learn, what books i should study and things i should do to prepare myself for cse aiml. Also waould like to know what courses or certificates i should get to help me do a post grad abroad. Thanks in advance!

comments.body: I would recommend just enjoying your last summer vacation - after this you will be busy every summer. If you really want to do something, check out MIT's Missing Semester and Harvard CS50. Also its too soon to even think about a Masters now, so its best to focus on undergrad. Things like how to prepare and what are needed are very subjective and depend on your plans and field of interest, which you probably have no idea about until you get to at least second year.
I second Rowley Anna, take a break kiddo. You need and deserve it.
